CN.content:

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 6 The V oc of PQCDTB was greater than the widely known poly(3-hexylthiophene) , P3HT ( V oc = 0.5 - 0.6 V ).

Let's think step by step.

Sure! The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. V oc (short for "open-circuit voltage")
2. PQCDTB (short for "poly(quarter-thiophene-2-ylene-3,5-diyl-4,6-diphenyl-1,3-dioxane-2,5-diyl)")
3. P3HT (short for "poly(3-hexylthiophene)")
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. V oc (open-circuit voltage)
2. PQCDTB
3. P3HT

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities in the "Property Name" column:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| V oc |
| PQCDTB |
| P3HT |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 6 The V oc of PQCDTB was greater than the widely known poly(3-hexylthiophene) , P3HT ( V oc = 0.5 - 0.6 V ).

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. V oc of PQCDTB
2. V oc of P3HT

The "Property Value" entities are the values of the electrical conductivity (V oc) of the two materials being compared, PQCDTB and P3HT.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the updated "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

1. V oc of PQCDTB
2. 0.5 - 0.6 V (the value range of V oc for P3HT)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Property Value" entities in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| V oc of PQCDTB |
| 0.5 - 0.6 V (P3HT) |
